newsitem.title: GERMANY: Deutsche opens environment tech website.
newsitem.headline: Deutsche opens environment tech website.

text.p: Deutsche Bank AG said on Tuesday it launched a new site on the World Wide Web with a database that includes information on more than 2,000 German environmental technology firms.
The database provides contacts and brief descriptions of the companies and around 7,000 product and service offerings.
There is no charge for using the database, which Deutsche has produced in co-operation with the information services firm CID GmbH - Informationssyteme und Datenbanken.
The site can be found at the following Web address: http://www.deutsche-bank.de/leistung/eco-select.
